title: Motion: This House would prioritize Earth climate resilience over Mars colonization investments.
topic: Motion: This House would prioritize Earth climate resilience over Mars colonization investments.

events.content: Motion: This House would prioritize Earth climate resilience over Mars colonization investments.
Proposition: redirecting funds to Earth keeps the only habitable planet stable, delivers immediate returns to vulnerable communities, and buys time for responsible space exploration later.
Opposition: sustained Mars programs drive breakthrough technology, diversify humanityâ€™s survival prospects, and ultimately supply tools that also strengthen climate resilience at home.
